titleStmt.title: SII 8.178: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 178. (A.R. No. 584 of 1902). ON THE SAME WALL.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śrīmaṟkittikku mel śrīkoccaṭai
paṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakravattikaḷ
śrīcuntarapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10
vatu tanunāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu duti
kaiyum nāyaṟṟukkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa pūca
ttu nāḷ Uṭaiyār tirukkāṉapperuṭai
ya nāyaṉār koyil Āticaṇṭecuranāyaṉār
tevakaṉmikaḷukkuk kiḻaikkoṭṭai
yāḷaṉ kalaṅkātakaṇṭanallūrt tevaṉ
toṅkaṉāṉa māḷavateventirapparaiyaṉe
ṉ nila vilaipramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭutta paricāvatu .
Innāyaṉāṟku nāṉ Iṟṟaināḷāl Icaintu viṟṟu
kuḷattu maṭaiyā
lum Empalkkuḷattu maṭaiyālum nirpāyuñ cey centivayakka
l taṭi 1m maṟaiyakkiṭappāṉ taṭi 1m tevivayakkal taṭi 1m
makkivayakkal taṭi 1m koḻuntaṉvayakkal taṭi 1m paḷḷaṉvirutti
taṭi 1m maṭaikkiḻttiṭṭut taṭi 1m pūvaṉvayakkal taṭi 1m teṟkil
pūvaṉvayakkal taṭi 1m mukkivayakkalukkuk kiḻakkut taṭi 1m Ūraṇi
ppuṟkarai taṭi 2m Āka Ivvakaippaṭiyāluḷḷa nilaṅkaḷum vākai
yum vempu kuṭiiruppup paṉaip puṅku puḷi Ātti Āvirai koḻiñci tiṭal
tiṭṭukkaḷum cuṟṟut taricukaḷum Ūraṇikaḷum Iṭumaram paṭumaraṅkaḷum me
lnokkiṉa maramuṅ kiḻnokkiṉa kiṇaṟukaḷuṅ kuḷamuṅ kuḷapparippum kuḷavā
yttalaiyum miṉpaṭu paḷḷamum teṉpaṭu potumpum puṟṟum teṟṟum Uṭum
poṭi Āmmai tavaḻiyum maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa camattap pirāttikaḷum Uṭpaṭṭavai
vilaipramāṇamāka kuṭutteeṉ māḷavateteventarap peraiyaṉeṉ Āticaṇ
ṭeccuratevakaṉmikaḷukkum Ipparicu viṟṟukuṭutta Innilaṅkaḷ
ṅkaḷukkum Ūraṇikaḷukkum kuṭiiruppu maṉaikkum tiṭalum tiṭṭu
kkaḷum cuṟṟut turavukaḷum Uṭpaṭa Emmi licaintu vilai niṟceyitta
varākaṉ 3 10 Ippaṇam muppatum vaṇṇakku Āticcatevar kāṭci
ppaṭi kāṭṭi Eṟṟik kaiyccela vaṟak koṇṭu civallavaṉperu
nteruvil viyāpārikaḷil māṅkuṭaiyāṉ Āvuṭaiyāṉ peruṅkaru
ṇaiyāḷar tam perālk kaṭṭiṉa peruṅkaruṇaiyāḷaṉcantikku nāṭṭā
r Iṟaiyilum variyilum kaḻittuk kuṭuttapaṭiyile Innilaṅkaḷum Ū
raṇikaḷum maraṅkaḷum maṉaiyum maṟṟum Eppeṟpaṭṭa camattap pirātti
kaḷum Uṭppaṭa viṟṟu vilaippiramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭutta Itukku I
tuve vilaiōlaiyum poruṭcelavolaiyu māvitākavum Ituva
llatu veṟu vilaimāvaṟutip poruḷmāvaṟutip poruṭcelavo
lai kāṭṭavuṅ kāṇavuṅ kaṭavataṉṟiye Orukālāvatum Irukālāvatu
m mukkālāvatum Olaikkuṟṟam Eḻuttukkuṟṟam colkkuṟṟam poruṭkuṟ
ṟam maṟṟum Ekkuṟṟamuṅ kuṟṟamaṉṟiye viṟṟu vilaipramāṇam paṇṇikku
ṭutteṉ Āticaṇṭecuranāyaṉār tevakaṉmikaḷukku māḷavateveṉtirappa
raiyaṉeṉ . Ippaṭikku māḷavateventirapparaiyaṉ taṟkuṟimāṭṭāṉa
maiyum Iṭṭu nāṉu maṟiveṉ cakkaravatti kāḷaiyar Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi
kkuc cakkaravattimallaṉāṉa Añcātakaṅkarāya ṉeḻuttu . kāṇaviṉiyakaṅ
kaṉ taṟkuṟimāṭṭeṟinteṉum Añcātakaṅkarāya ṉeḻuttu . Ippaṭi
kku Ivarkaḷ colla Ivvilaipramāṇam Eḻutiṉeṉ
maṅkalanāṭṭuveḷā ṉeḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 8.178 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
